title: Google\Cloud\OsConfig\V1\OSPolicyAssignment\InstanceFilter
name: InstanceFilter
description:
Filters to select target VMs for an assignment.

If more than one filter criteria is specified below, a VM will be selected if and only if it satisfies all of them.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.osconfig.v1.OSPolicyAssignment.InstanceFilter

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.all
params.description: Target all VMs in the project. If true, no other criteria is permitted.

params.name: data.inclusion_labels
params.description: List of label sets used for VM inclusion. If the list has more than one LabelSet, the VM is included if any of the label sets are applicable for the VM.

params.name: data.exclusion_labels
params.description: List of label sets used for VM exclusion. If the list has more than one label set, the VM is excluded if any of the label sets are applicable for the VM.

params.name: data.inventories
params.description: List of inventories to select VMs. A VM is selected if its inventory data matches at least one of the following inventories.
